[OpenHandleCodeExamples Code Examples]
== OpenHandle Smalltalk Code Examples ==


The examples here are for [http://www.squeak.org/ Squeak] - the free, cross-platform Smalltalk-80 implementation. But this is very experimental. Main problem being that I don't have a working version of the [http://wiki.squeak.org/squeak/5865 CurlPlugin] for Mac OS X. Anyhows, not tried this but looks promising. This code uses the [http://map1.squeakfoundation.org/sm/package/d38bdc2d-e52a-4167-ae73-2cf438c65c2f json] package, which is distributed in [http://wiki.squeak.org/squeak/1287 Monticello] format.

See the blog [http://blogs.corriga.net/giovanni/ Jazz Programming], and these posts on RESTful Web Services for Yahoo! News Search: [http://blogs.corriga.net/giovanni/archives/2007/7/3/restful_web_services_example_215/ Example 2.15 (JSON)] and the earlier post [http://blogs.corriga.net/giovanni/archives/2007/6/28/restful_web_services_example_21/ Example 2.1 (XML)]

{{{
% cat handler.st
doHandle: aHandle
    | openHandle term json h |
    "Answer a text description of the Handle value set"
    openHandle := 'http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle'.
    term := aHandle encodeForHTTP.
    json := Curl new getContentsUrl: baseURI , '?format=json&id=' , term.
    h := Json readFrom: json readStream.
    ((h at: #handleValues) do:
        [:value |
        Transcript
            show: (value at: #index) printString;
            cr.
        Transcript
            show: (value at: #type) printString;
            cr.
        Transcript
            show: (value at: #data) printString;
            cr.
        ]
}}}
